channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Custom Fields Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Custom Fields Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24241|2024-08-03T19:21:18.775Z -- unknown -- advanced%20custom%20fields%20pro
item.description: The Advanced Custom Fields Pro WordPress plugin before 5.9.1 did not properly escape the generated update URL when outputting it in an attribute, leading to a reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue in the update settings page.
